Company DescriptionAre you a mechanical engineer with a natural understanding of technics, and are you looking for a job where its all different every day Then you are the right candidate and we would like to invite you to respond to this vacancySince 1836, KenzFigee has designed the most groundbreaking cranes and hoisting systems Sturdy marine canes and offshore equipment that has gone on to shape many of the worlds harbors and offshore installations today With a keen eye for market developments and a focus on innovation, KenzFigee has become a trusted supplier and service provider of customerspecific cranes and equipment for the worldwide offshore oil  gas, wind energy, harbor  bulk handling and navy  defense industriesOur people form the core of our success With a team of around ninety professionals, we operate from our office and workshop in Zaandam This offers the opportunity to experience the entire process up close, from designing to building the cranes and equipment, which ensures an ultimate collaboration between all departments A company with a drive innovation is in our genesAs Project Engineer you are responsible for the technical part of a project You will plan, coordinate and control the engineering process You take care of the project progress and provide the required information from and to the various departments Furthermore, you are responsible for technical communication with customersQualificationsAdditional InformationAt KenzFigee we know how to appreciate craftsmanship and initiative You get an independent job, with a lot of responsibility and freedom You will also experience a collegial, informal atmosphere that encourages you to get more out of yourself31 06 25010741Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld

SummaryNIBC is looking for a Compliance Officer to focus on its Corporate Banking activitiesManaging compliance risk and complying with bank relevant applicable laws, regulations and standards in both personal and business conduct is the responsibility of every employee working for NIBC Compliance supports management and employees in these tasks Management is responsible for identifying and communicating compliance requirements that each employee must fulfil in daytoday business activities Compliance provides the necessary assistance and adviceNIBC has a Head of Compliance  Regulatory Affairs and Compliance team in The Hague and designated Local Compliance Officers LCO in the other NIBC offices in Frankfurt, London and Brussels The Compliance  Regulatory Affairs function within NIBC operates as separate independent Business Unit BU This BU is part of the SBU Risk, Legal, Compliance and CSR RLCC, and the Head of Compliance  Regulatory Affairs reports directly to the Chief Risk Officer and the Managing BoardKey focus of Compliance is the 3 lines of defence model to advise on and manageremediate compliance risk  conduct matters at strategic, transaction and personal level, to monitor and control compliance risks within the agreed policy and control frameworks, to ensure our frameworks and policies remain up to date and to train  educate all staff on an ongoing basis to ensure appropriate and efficient compliance risk management across our organisationThe team consists of around 15 FTEs and consists of a Compliance team, a Regulatory Affairs team and a Project  Strategy Office The team works on the basis of its Compliance  Regulatory Affairs Charter, the Compliance  Regulatory Affairs year planning  including monitoring plan  and a Target Operating ModelThe Compliance  Regulatory Affairs team is searching for a Compliance Officer to cover NIBCs Corporate Banking division The ideal candidate likes to work with skilled professionals in a complex, dynamic, demanding and international environmentEducationPersonality  SkillsNIBC is a relatively small bank with a very dynamic and informal culture You will have a direct impact on both the bank and its clients Being a Compliance Officer at NIBC will give you substantial responsibilities, direct exposure to senior management and enable you to understand how the bank works This is a unique opportunity in which you can best showcase your talentsFurthermore we nurture our entrepreneurial and inventive culture by providing modern flexible devices and working spaces You can therefore work where and when you want which improves your performance and worklife balanceApplications can only be submitted via our website The apply button will take you directly to the Quick Apply page Here you can upload your CV The system immediately extracts the necessary information from your CV Please note that further on in the application form you will have the possibility to upload more documents Dont forget to add your motivation letter Instead of a motivation letter you can choose to make a 2minute video outlining your motivation An assessment may be part of the application procedureFor more information about the procedure you may contact the HR Infodesk at askhrnibccom For more information about the position please contact the teamlead, Bart Koch, at bartkochnibccomFull time

This is a full time limited term position ending 3172022In this role, you will support implementation of the Forest Economy Program FEPs dialogue and research pillars, working closely and synergistically with the other program partners You will conduct research on the climate impacts of forest products and help the FEP to gather perspectives and build consensus around the scope and nature of the climatesmart forest economy and how it can be achieved, This role requires strong vision, a strategic mindset, interpersonal skills, and extensive knowledge of the forest products sector and how forests intersect with the economy, social issues, and technology In addition, you should thrive operating in a resultsfocused culture

Job Title: Volunteer Technology and Business Experts to Help Social Entrepreneurs for Ashoka Changemakers United Africa - VIRTUAL with Ashoka - Africa Diamond
Industry: ['Information Technology and Services', 'Nonprofit Organization Management', 'Financial Services']
Job Description: This is an opportunity to work with an Ashoka StaffThis is an unpaid, volunteer opportunityAbout The Affiliated OrganizationOver the last three decades, Ashoka has played a key role in developing the field of social entrepreneurship and has selected and supported over 3,600 leading social entrepreneurs who are advancing systemic change across sectors and countries Together they have contributed to nurturing a growing citizen sector, building bridges to the business and the public sectors, and seeding a global movement of changemakers Every Ashoka Fellow is part of a larger mosaic of solutions that points toward a new paradigm for their field Being at the center of this network provides Ashoka with a deep understanding of the underlying trends and key levers of social change and helps identify where interventions are most needed in societySince 1990, the Ashoka network in Africa has yielded some valuable insights about systemschanging solutions to improve social and economic outcomes on the continent Some recent partnerships have focused on tapping our network to reveal patterns and innovations in nourishment and nutrition in agriculture Gates Foundation, youth livelihoods and leadership The MasterCard Foundation, changemaking education Oxford University Press, Frey Charitable Foundation, Rockefeller Foundation, and the environment and sustainability Cartier Charitable Foundation At the core of every innovation is an African who saw a gap and entrepreneured a solution Thats why, in addition to finding and supporting leading social entrepreneurs and identifying patterns in social innovation, Ashoka Africa builds partnerships focused on supporting emerging changemakers and playing a critical role in convening the collaborative ecosystems that will ensure Africa is a place where everyone works together to methodically shift social systemsFor more information, please visit httpswwwashokaorgenuseventchangemakersunitedafricaChangemakers United is a collective effort to support social innovators at the forefront of the Covid19 crisis We have selected and supported the innovative solutions of 16 social entrepreneurs from the Ashoka Africa network These leading social entrepreneurs  13 Ashoka Fellows and 3 Young Changemakers  from across Africa are focused on solving challenges related to the various aspects of the crisis healthcare, economic resilience, protection of vulnerable groups, access to education or fake news Our support is threefold All of our 16 social entrepreneurs require digital expertise in scaling up their solutions Most of these needs focus on setting up online platforms, creating and managing databases, and developing websites As a result, we are looking for digital experts with skillsets in coding and programming to join the Ashoka Changemakers United program as Probono experts The role of Probono Experts would be to provide specific strategic andor handson support that will help accelerate the social innovators impact We estimate that most of the digital projects would require 4  5 hours of volunteered time and effort over the next four months We are also looking for those experienced in these fieldsEstimated hours required per week 20 minutes per Week, 4 to 5 hours in total over 3 monthsThe estimated duration of the project is 13 monthsThis position is VirtualEnglish FrenchLinkedin for Good Volunteering

Job Description: Assistant SupervisorAre you developing yourself into a leader within a logistics environment at ArvatoAt our location Heijen, NoordLimburg, a position as Assistant Supervisor has opened Its a fulltime position in which you lead and motivate a group of employees to meet their best abilitiesAs an at Arvato, you are responsible for managing your team 1020 employees You are the point of contact on the floor and you empower your employees You divide and coordinate the activities on a daily basis, aimed at the effective execution of all tasks and challenges within the warehouse Together with the Supervisor, you plan the employees based on their best abilitiesYour tasks and responsibilities as an Assistant Supervisor at ArvatoYou will be working for our Healthcare business unit Its services are characterized by strict product security standards, as well as special requirements for internal communication and communication with the client You work in a 2shift system which shifts weeklyYou enjoy standing in front of a group and you convey your message in a clear and motivating way Training and coaching employees is a second nature to you and you radiate energy You also always remain alert to the process, you initiate improvement opportunities and you are happy to commit to innovative projectsWe are growing and we believe it is important that our employees also continue to growIn this position, you learn a lot about motivating a team and the processes in our warehouse At Arvato you stand on the steering wheel of your own careerIn addition to a competitive salary and travel allowance, we also offer youArvato Supply Chain Solutions is internationally the leading provider of ordertocash solutions for end customeroriented industries Working across 85 locations in over 20 countries, we develop innovative, tailored solutions for our customers Our global vision is to become the international supply chain management company with the strongest customer focus and best IT knowhowIn the Netherlands we serve our customers from 4 locations Heijen, Venlo, Venray and SchipholRijk Our more than 1000 employees are dedicated to offer flexible and qualityoriented logistic solutions to our customers In collaboration with the customer we determine a logistics process that meets their needs We invest in innovative solutions such as optimizing automation and digitization but also in our employeesThen apply by the Apply now button and upload your resume and cover letter written in English Our recruitment department will contact you about the further processDo you not fully meet the job requirements and are you curious about what it is like to work at Arvato Feel free to contact us We answer all your questions and are happy to think about any optionsAnne Derks, Corporate RecruiterT 31 06 14724555E recruitmentarvatocomArvato Benelux BV  Supply Chain SolutionsNetherlandsLimburgHeijen6598 MH107963107963 Arvato Benelux BV  Supply Chain SolutionsfalseDate Nov 17, 2020LocationHeijen, LI, NL, 6598 MHManager, Logistics, Warehouse, Supply, Supply Chain Manager, Management, Operations, Manufacturing

Industry: ['Nonprofit Organization Management', 'Logistics and Supply Chain', 'Financial Services']
Job Description: DescriptionThe Partnership for Supply Chain Management PFSCM brings together multiple private sector and nongovernmental organizations that are among the most trusted names in supply chain management and international public health and development in the world PFSCM has been recognized internationally for its work to save lives through stronger public health supply chains the partnership won two supply chain distinction awards from the European Supply Chain and Logistics Summit in 2010 and was a finalist in the 2012 Supply Chain Innovation Award Competition sponsored by the Council of Supply Chain Management Professionals CSCMP and SupplyChainBrainThe Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria is a major financing institution in the fight against these diseases in 140 countries The Global Fund selected PFSCM to be its primary Procurement Agent for Global Fund principal recipients, under its Pooled Procurement MechanismPPM aimed at ensuring a costeffective and efficient procurement process that meets all the Global Fund standards for a Procurement Agent This service provides support to countries to resolve procurement bottlenecks and supply chain management challenges and to facilitate timely access to pharmaceuticals and other health productsIn addition, PFSCM implements other supply chain management projects with other clientdonors including the Malaria Consortium and several developing country governmentsThe PMA Analyst is responsible to support the measurement and improvement of PFSCMs business and analytic processes to enable PFSCM to deliver operational excellence and innovation for our clients The PMA Analyst is expected to support the gathering and analysis of performance data, and ensure that performance reporting on operational activities is completed timely and accuratelyThe Analyst is expected to help other units across the organization by supporting data collection, data reporting, conducting data quality audits, designing quantitative models, and presenting PFSCM performance to various audiences both in written and verbal presentations The PMA Analyst will help to define new performance monitoring, data visualization, and data analytics approaches to support PFSCM operational teams continuous improvement efforts The Analyst will also be involved in the quantitative theory, visual design, and continual improvement of performance reportingThe PMA Analyst is also expected to assist in mapping and documenting business processes, tracking Standard Operating Procedures SOPs, and gathering information on how problems can be solved within the organization environment The Analyst will assist during process improvement meetings and specific incident investigation discussions as needed This role is further expected to support efforts to build a datacentric culture, ensuring that staff and managers have the tools and skills needed to use insights from data and analytics in their program planning, decision making, and organizational innovation, working with the PMA UnitLead the design, development, planning, validation, and deployment of Wat ga je doenDe duizenden militairen die zich dagelijks inzetten voor vrede en veiligheid zijn goed opgeleid Zo zorgt het Instituut Defensie Leergangen onder andere voor de persoonlijke ontwikkeling van officieren In Breda lever jij als senior medewerker onderwijs en bedrijfsvoering daaraan een belangrijke bijdrage Jij zet je dagelijks in voor een optimale bedrijfsvoering van de Nederlandse Defensie AcademieAls senior medewerker onderwijs en bedrijfsvoering lopen ondersteunende processen als een rode draad door je werkdag Jij bent degene die het Instituut Defensie Leergangen in de breedste zin van het woord ondersteunt Je steekt je handen uit de mouwen als het gaat om bestuurlijke processen, maar ontlast de opleidingsafdelingen ook bij andere processenNaast die ondersteuning neem jij als het nodig is werkzaamheden van collegas over Dat is weliswaar geen dagelijks werk, maar wel belangrijk Samen met je collegas werk je immers aan datzelfde doel het op een nog hoger niveau brengen van de onderwijsbedrijfsvoering van het Instituut Defensie Leergangenschaal 102750 bruto per maand4400 bruto per maandTijdelijke aanstelling  Arbeidsovereenkomst voor bepaalde tijdTijdelijke aanstelling voor de duur van 3 jaar38Breda, NoordBrabantNaast het salaris en vakantiegeld kun je rekenen op een eindejaarsuitkering van 8,33 Defensie hecht sterk aan persoonlijke groei en loopbaanontwikkeling en biedt daarvoor tal van mogelijkheden Tot de secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden behoren onder meer maximaal 75 betaald ouderschapsverlof onder voorwaarden, studiefaciliteiten, een extra verlofregeling voor ouderen en een vergoeding woonwerkverkeerDefensie zet zich in voor de belangen, welvaart en vrijheid van Nederland We zijn dagelijks actief in binnen en buitenland Onze wereldwijde inzet versterkt de internationale samenwerking en zorgt ervoor dat mensen zich in vrijheid kunnen ontplooien Nu en in de toekomstBij het ministerie van Defensie werken ongeveer 62000 mensen direct en indirect aan vrede en veiligheid Het ministerie bestaat uit de Bestuursstaf het departement, de Koninklijke Marine, de Koninklijke Landmacht, de Koninklijke Luchtmacht, de Koninklijke Marechaussee, het Defensie Ondersteuningscommando DOSCO en de Defensie Materieel Organisatie DMODefensie is een van de grootste werkgevers van Nederland en vertoont overeenkomsten met een groot bedrijf De operationele commandos zee, land en luchtstrijdkrachten, de Marechaussee, het DOSCO en de DMO lijken op werkmaatschappijenHet DOSCO is de overkoepelende dienstverlener voor de gehele defensieorganisatie Elk dienstencentrum heeft zijn eigen expertise Het DOSCO streeft ernaar de klantgerichtheid te versterken, de dienstverlening te professionaliseren en de doelmatigheid te vergrotenJe werkt binnen het Instituut Defensie Leergangen van de Nederlandse Defensie Academie NLDA De NLDA verzorgt voor Defensie de initile officiersopleidingen, het hoger loopbaanonderwijs en de begeleiding op het gebied van leiderschapsontwikkeling Met een gentegreerd programma van militaire opleiding, persoonsvorming en academisch onderwijs, levert de NLDA een belangrijke bijdrage aan professioneel leiderschap binnen Defensie Bovendien verricht de NLDA wetenschappelijk onderzoek voor Defensie en samenleving Ook levert de NLDA een belangrijke bijdrage aan de kwaliteit van de samenwerking binnen teams en aan leiderschap en morele professionaliteit binnen DefensieHet Instituut Defensie Leergangen IDL verzorgt de postinitile joint loopbaanopleidingen voor Defensie, gericht op de beroepsgerichte persoonlijke ontwikkeling van officieren en gelijkgestelde burgers Dat doen we door het ontwikkelen van de competenties kennis, vaardigheden en beroepshouding die zij nodig hebben om effectief te kunnen functioneren op midden, hoger en executive niveau binnen de Defensieorganisatie Het IDL is op hoofdlijnen ingericht naar de verschillende loopbaanopleidingen die het instituut verzorgt De Top, Hogere en de Middelbare Defensie Vorming zijn elk in een aparte afdeling ondergebrachtDe afdeling Internationale en Specifieke Opleidingen verzorgt opleidingen voor buitenlandse militairen orientation and staff officers courses en een aantal specifieke, kortdurende opleidingen en cursussen voor medewerkers binnen Defensie

Job Title: Volunteer: Sustainable Farming Experience in Chile
Industry: ['Marketing and Advertising', 'Nonprofit Organization Management', 'Hospital & Health Care']
Job Description: Location Coihueco, ChileDuration Minimum 1 weekStart Dates Project is ongoing, and you can join at any time, depending upon availability Placements start each MondayFee Includes all food, accommodation, airport pickup, predeparture  incountry support, orientation and all project related activitiesDoes not Include flights, travel insurance, personal spending, visas and vaccinationsThis opportunity is designed to give you the contacts and experience to help further your career You are not replacing any member of staff, but helping alongside them, whilst learning new skills 375 Euros per weekIn this unique placement, youll be helping local farmers in the beautiful Chile countryside Helping them with their daily routine, this active placement is ideal for those looking to make a difference in the worldBased in Coihueco, the farms you will be working on could be big or small, depending upon where your efforts are needed most The majority of villagers in the area and you will be helping to them It is also worth keeping in mind that some farms focus on more than just one type of produce, so you could need to help take care of numerous plants and cropsYour tasks will vary depending upon the type of farm youre based on Some farms such as raspberries, strawberries, apples and plums Others such as potatoes, cabbages and lettuce So, your tasks may include cleaning the farm, watering the crops and picking fruits and vegetablesAs you work alongside the local farmers, youll see just how well theyve managed to They literally live off the land, eating the foods they have grown themselves and supplementing them only with a few basic items This gives you the opportunity to learn from your experience and develop your own sustainable lifestyle when you get back home if you desireAs the placement is very handson, it would suit those who are generally fit and healthy and who arent afraid of hard work You will also need to enjoy being outdoorsDaily LifeYou will be working Monday through until Friday, helping local farmers with their daily tasks After having a delicious breakfast, youll start work on the farm until lunch Then, after lunch, you will get back to work right through until dinner timeAlthough the schedule is the same throughout the week, your daily tasks will differ You may not be working on the same farm all week either it all depends upon where your efforts are needed most during the time of the placement This gives you a varied placement, giving you the chance to learn more about different types of farmingMany farms have numerous types of crops, vegetables and fruits to tend to This means you really need to be prepared to get your hands dirty It will be hard work, but extremely rewardingAs you finish in time for dinner, you also have the opportunity to explore the surrounding area This enables you to fully immerse yourself within the local Chile community You can spend your time making new lifelong friends, or simply relaxing after a hard days workall information above is subject to change Please check the most up to date information on the Global Nomadic website when applying

Job Title: Assistant Professor (1,0 fte) in Operations Management
Job Description: For This Position, We Are Open To Any Research Area In Operations Management That Is Rigorous And Relevant To Industry, Including, But Not Limited ToToday we are seeing that many sectors in industry including manufacturing, warehousing, distribution, transportation, retail and services, are being transformed by fast developments in digital, automation, manufacturing and robotic technologies These developments ask for smart decision making at strategic, tactical and operational levels, bringing increased speed and output by using the same or even fewer scarce resources As Assistant Professor your main challenge is to develop novel methods in Operations Management that are relevant to these exciting challenges in industryAs a successful candidate, you will contribute to the Operations Planning, Accounting  Control OPAC group, which traditionally has a strong presence in application domains such as logistics, maintenance, manufacturing, and supply chain You are expected to initiate, perform, and supervise highquality research, and teach and codevelop courses in Bachelor and Master Programmes of the School of Industrial Engineering You will collaborate with other experts in the OPAC group and in the department of Industrial Engineering and Innovation Sciences In that way you will benefit from collaboration with experts in diverse areas, as well as from the strong ties the department maintains with industry

strategy, Innovating the business opportunities and implementing Digital Innovation propositions in the market to increase their competitive position and increase revenuesWe are expanding our team with SeniorManaging Consultants who have a broad range of skills in transformational consulting and a background in Growth Strategy and Platform Thinking Strategy, Digital Innovation, Implementation You are a consulting professional with expertise in the following areas eg Platform business model strategy development, running Digital acceleratorsincubators, driving or supporting Platform Technology implementation tracks, Business Transformation, Design InnovationTo strengthen our Digital Strategy  Innovation Team, we are looking forMain purpose of the role is participating in and contribute to sales initiatives and thought leadership, all of this leading to you building further competencies and value propositions which will help PA to acquire new clients and expand our business with our current clients and grow your career within the firmDepending on your years of experience, you can deliver on the followingApart from a base salary which is in line with practice, we offerWere an innovation and transformation consultancy that believes in the power of ingenuity to build a positivehuman future in a technologydriven world Our diverse teams of experts combine makes us a stronger firm and look to employ people with different ideas, styles and skill sets This diversity stimulates a rich, creative environment  one in which our people develop, and our clients enjoy enduring results Were committed to recruiting, promoting and rewarding our people solely based on their ability to contribute to PAs goals, without regard to their sex, race, disability, religion, national origin, ethnicity, sexual orientation, age or marital status We welcome international applications, but we are unable to offer sponsorship for work permits, so you will need to have the full right to live and work in The Netherlands Unfortunately, your application will be automatically rejected if you do not have these rights It is a prerequisite to have a proficiency in the Dutch language at B1 level

MAIN PURPOSETo manage, rationalise and harmonise our extensive international real estate portfolio By empowering real estate coordinators in countries where we have a presence By optimizing and innovating real estate software solutions And by proactively identifying and mitigating high risk contracts yourself Your overall ambitions are 1 to reduce rent levels to reflect future market conditions, 2 increase flexibility and agility across the portfolio, and 3 to align all leases Additionally, you will develop, promote, and implement a unified way of working for all countries we operate inAs Real Estate Portfolio Manager you are a welcome member of the CHO Real Estate Team This team plots Rituals overall real estate strategy and proactively assists country teams in executing plans on a local level It is up to you  often working in tandem with the Director Real Estate  Expansion  to ensure the real estate portfolio optimally facilitates the broader retail strategy, both from short and longterm perspectives We are also eager to prioritise portfolio flexibility to improve our preparedness for black swans, such as the current pandemic, that necessitate a sudden and profound rethink And we want you to zoom in on the numbers to identify potential portfolio cost savings Two important topics are mitigating high over portfolio risks, and further developing and digitizing robust real estate processesAnalysing data and metrics is a large part of the job, as you manage and improve complex portfolio management processes Translate analytical data into actionable insights that help stakeholders optimise store hiring and opening processes In everything you do, aim for efficiency Structure processes and developpromote a unified way of working  including setting up lines of communication and feedback loops with local teams You define the playing field, and the rules our teams play by to achieve renegotiation outcomes And while a harmonised approach is the ideal, you also strive to accommodate cultural idiosyncrasies and always comply with local laws and regulations Our location renewal and closure targets are best met with a think globally, act locally approachAs Real Estate Portfolio Manager you are the linking pin between CHO and the local teams you inspire and commit Eg by offering them support, and by organizing training sessions You also oversee the financial management of rental obligations to improve Rituals market position You primarily interact with 3rd party service providers eg Visual Lease, CHO departments including Legal, Format  Design, Retail, Finance and Control, and our Real Estate Coordinators and Real Estate Managers You report to the Director of Real Estate  ExpansionRaymond Cloosterman, CEO RitualsWe are a global brand, established in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, in 2000 Our ambition is to grow sustainably and become  and remain  the number one global luxury brand in cosmetics Today, Rituals has over 730 stores, across 29 countries throughout Europe, Asia, the Middle East and North and South America with the aim to open 1,000 new locations by the end of 2020By joining Rituals, youll get to experience a strong culture and entrepreneurial spirit which empowers you to create your meaningful career We care about the wellbeing of our staff, as much as we value the wellbeing of the planet By passionately looking after both, we believe we can pave the way to a more sustainable world and take appropriate action to limit our footprint on Mother Earth Youll have a strong sense of purpose at Rituals Our mission is to make people feel good and touch as many lives as possible Independent of your role, you will create a positive impact on our daily businessIf its you were looking for, please dont hesitate and send in your application Well be in touch soon

Job Title: Internship | Development and Study of a Model for CO-N2 Separation
Job Description: What will you be doingAt the Biomass  Energy Efficiency BEE department of TNO, we support societys move towards a lowcarbon future by industrial innovation To achieve utilization of the CO in offgases it needs to be separated from N2, which is commonly present in larger quantities Due to the similarities of molecular and bulk properties of CO and N2 this separation is difficult Stateoftheart technologies are based on cryogenic distillation and absorption TNO is developing a novel separation process based on adsorption The aim of this internship is to develop a reference model of a vacuum pressure swing absorption process The model will be adapted from the existing model at TNO The work scope includes model development based on literature information , the definition and execution of simulation studies, as well as the interpretation and presentation of simulation resultsWe are looking for MSc students in Chemical Engineering, or related disciplines, with the following characteristicsTNO is an independent research organisation whose expertise and research make an important contribution to the competitiveness of companies and organisations, to the economy and to the quality of society as a whole Innovation with purpose is what TNO stands for With 3000 people we develop knowledge not for its own sake but for practical application To create new products that make life more pleasant and valuable and help companies innovate To find creative answers to the questions posed by society We work for a variety of customers governments, companies, service providers and nongovernmental organisations Working together on new knowledge, better products and clear recommendations for policy and processes In everything we do, impact is the key Our product and process innovations and recommendations are only worth something if our customers can use them to boost their competitivenessThe BEE department has an excellent track record in process technology development Unique modelling and experimental tools have been developed over the years, including demonstration installations that can be found all over the world Within the roadmap Towards a CO2 neutral industry, we collaborate with a variety of partners, including large enterprises, SMEs, universities and government organizations, to achieve the decarbonization of the industrial sector We offer a challenging and international working environment in a field that is of eminent importance for our future needs In your work you will be integral part of a project team and it will include interaction with TNO employees and fellow students, developing both your technical and personal skills You will be working on real industrial cases, being supervised and coached by experienced TNO staff You will be part of a multidisciplinary research team, which includes scientists, engineers, consultants and technicians You will be located at the TNO site in Petten, in the northwest of Netherlands A suitable work placement compensation will be providedYou want to work on the precursor of your career an internship gives you an opportunity to take a good look at your prospective future employer TNO goes a step further Its not just looking that interests us you and your knowledge are essential to our innovation Thats why we attach a great deal of value to your personal and professional development You will, of course, be properly supervised during your internship and be given the scope for you to get the best out of yourselfThen please feel free to apply on this vacancy For further questions dont hesitate to contact usDue to Covid19 and the consequent uncertainties and restrictions, students who are not residing in the Netherlands may currently not be able to start an internship or graduation project at TNOLeonie Lcking310611407983

Job Title: Intern in the Advanced Concepts and Studies Office
Job Description: EUROPEAN SPACE AGENCYInternship Opportunity in the Directorate of Technology, Engineering and Quality ESA is an equal opportunity employer, committed to achieving diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates irrespective of gender, sexual orientation, ethnicity, beliefs, age, disability or other characteristics Applications from women are encouragedESTEC, Noordwijk, The NetherlandsUnder the direct authority of the Head of the Systems Department, and in direct support to the Director General for the preparation of the Agencys future activities, the Head of the Advanced Concepts and Studies Office is responsible forInterested candidates are encouraged to visit the ESA websiteEvolutionary algorithms, inspired by biological evolution, are very successful in optimizing problems where the gradient information is not available One drawback of these methods, in most settings, is their slow convergence on high dimensional problems, such as those often encountered for example in trajectory design or remote sensing tasks Potential tradeoffs in objectives and constraints, as they are encountered in mission design thermal and radiation protection, energy consumption, size, mass, etc further exacerbate the search for good local optima Multilevel evolutionary algorithms mitigate this by performing evolution on several degrees of coarseness, but require manual definition of the different representations In multilevel graph partitioning, representations of the different levels are found automatically by considering the connectedness of their elements 1The objective of this internship is to understand whether a multilevel graph partitioning approach can be used to speed up evolutionary algorithms in the aerospace engineering domain by keeping highly correlated parameters fixed relative to each other and thus decreasing the effective dimensionality of the problem The method would be used to find an initial solution to be refined by recovering the original representation for a subsequent local optimization1 Sanders, Peter, and Christian Schulz KaHIPKarlsruhe High Quality Partitioning 2019Self MotivationCommunicationContinuous LearningCrossCultural SensitivityTeamworkCandidates must have student status and be enrolled at university for the entire duration of the internship Applicants should preferably be in their final or second to last year of a University course at Masters Level in a technical or scientific disciplineMandatoryDesirableExceptionally this year, due to the uncertainties arising from the COVID19 pandemic, the student internship programme will be offered remotely, with interns working from their place of residence, not hosted at an ESA site Some Universities might not authorise remote internships, we recommend to consult your universitys requirements for compulsory internships This decision has been taken in response to the COVID19 measures currently in place in ESA Member States, Associate Member States and Cooperating States and also across ESA establishmentsFor behavioural competencies expected from ESA staff in general, please refer to theAt the Agency we value diversity and we welcome people with disabilities Whenever possible, we seek to accommodate individuals with disabilities by providing the necessary support at the workplace The Human Resources Department can also provide assistance during the recruitment process If you would like to discuss this further please contact us at contacthumanresourcesesaintPlease note that applications are only considered from nationals of one of the following States Austria, Belgium, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and the United Kingdom Nationals from Latvia and Slovenia, as Associate Member States, or Canada as a Cooperating State, can apply as well as those from Bulgaria, Cyprus, Lithuania and Slovakia as European Cooperating States ECS

Details van de functieAangenaam thuisBij Tzorg geven we die zekerheid met huishoudelijke hulp Jij straks ook, zodra je als thuishulp de handen uit de mouwen steekt Hoe dat zit Dit is vakantiewerk waar je cht goed kunt verdienen, door mensen te helpen bij het huishouden Werken met een warm hart, betrokken en dichtbij de mensen Een vakantiebaan in de regio Velsen waar je veel lol in gaat hebben, dat garanderen we jeToegewijd, betrokken en vertrouwd Een helpende hand in het huishouden zorgt ervoor dat mensen langer zelfstandig aangenaam thuis kunnen wonen Daar doen onze bijna 10000 medewerkers het voor We zijn actief in 300 gemeenten in Nederland en zijn trots op wat we doen Fijne werksfeer, betrokkenheid en aandacht voor mensen staan centraal Een landelijke organisatie met een regionale uitstraling Pas jij daarbijVerder ben je max 24 uur beschikbaar op maandag tm vrijdag tussen 09001700 uurWie goed is voor een ander, verdient zelf ook het allerbeste Zodra je als vakantiekracht start als thuishulp mag je aan de slag voor maximaal 30 uur per week Daarnaast krijg je bij Tzorg meer mooie arbeidsvoorwaarden als blijk van waardering Welke dat zijnDeze vacature voor thuishulp kan zomaar jouw nieuwe vakantiebaan worden als je een flinke dosis energie en enthousiasme meeneemt naar Tzorg Voeg je daar ook je oprechte interesse in een ander aan toe, dan maak je echt het verschilOns succes begint bij jou Of eigenlijk begint het bij jouw sollicitatie naar deze vacature voor vakantiewerk als thuishulp in VelsenWil je eerst nog wat vragen Dat kan natuurlijk Valentina Bos, HR functionaris beantwoordt je vragen via klik hier voor het telefoonnummer Gerelateerde opleidingencursussen aan de sectoren van deze vacature

Heb jij affiniteit met een gezonde en actieve levensstijl en ben jij op zoek naar een veelzijdige functie Dan is de functie van Assistant, Management Operations bij Herbalife iets voor jouWat breng je meeAls Assistant Management Operations heb jij een groot verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel Je bent de rechterhand van het MT en kan kritisch kijken naar processen Het is belangrijk dat de werkweek effectief gepland wordt, zodat er zoveel mogelijk uit een week gehaald kan worden Je moet niet alleen kritisch zijn, maar dit ook durven uit te spreken Het is hiervoor belangrijk dat je gestructureerd te werk gaat en een todo lijst af kan werken Je kan goed omgaan met ad hoc taken en weet te schakelen tussen de verschillende afdelingen Je hebt een proactieve houding, waardoor je altijd een stap verder denkt Naast dat je goed kan samen werken met alle collegas van Herbalife, kan je ook goed zelfstandig te werk gaanDaarnaast voldoe jij aan de volgende eisenWat ga je doenTer versterking van het Management Team is Personato namens Herbalife Nutrition op zoek naar een Assistant Management Operations Je wordt de assistent van het MT, dat bestaat uit twee Senior Country Managers en de managers van de afdelingen Marketing  Sales, Events en Member Services Jij bent een spin in het web, kent alle collegas van de verschillende afdelingen en weet met wie je moet schakelen bij vraagstukken Binnen jouw takenpakket pak je administratieve taken van het MT op, help je de afdelingen met administratieve taken en projecten en heb je een facilitaire rol binnen HerbalifeJe bent in jouw rol onder andere verantwoordelijk voorWaar kom je te werkenHerbalife Nutrition, opgericht in 1980, is een internationaal beursgenoteerde voedingsorganisatie Met hun unieke producten ondersteunt Herbalife haar klanten bij een gezonde en actieve leefstijl Door hun innovatieve producten zijn zij marktleider in de branche en hebben zij enkele bekende topsporters aan zich weten te binden Deze producten worden niet in winkels aangeboden, maar worden aangeboden via onafhankelijke distributeursWereldwijd zijn er meer dan 3 miljoen distributeurs In Nederland zit het hoofdkantoor gevestigd in Utrecht met ongeveer 30 medewerkers Vanuit deze locatie wordt de Nederlandse, Belgische en Maltese markt ondersteundIn Venray is sinds 1998 het distributiecentrum gevestigd, waar meer dan 260 medewerkers zorg dragen voor de distributie van de Herbalife producten naar individuele members Tevens dient de locatie in Venray als centraal punt voor de wereldwijde distributieBen jij de Assistant Management Operations die we zoeken Dan word je onderdeel van een mooie informele organisatie en kan je rekenen op de volgende arbeidsvoorwaardenBij Herbalife heerst een informele sfeer, waarbij , respect voor elkaar en open communicatie centraal staan Ze vinden het belangrijk dat iedereen met naar werk gaat Hierbij is en voor de medewerkers vanzelfsprekendJe komt in een mooie werkomgeving te werken en zit zonder corona op kantoor bij het managementteam Er wordt hard gewerkt, maar heerst een fijne en  Zo is er normaal gesproken maandelijks een borrel op kantoor en zijn er jaarlijks uitjes met alle collegas

From 1 March 2021, the International Institute for Asian Studies IIAS is looking for anEditorial assistantThe editorial assistant will support the editor of the IIAS Newsletter and assist the editor of the IIAS review website newbooksasia The Newsletter is published three times per year and contains some 56 pages with articles on recent global developments in the field of Asian Studies The global readership of the Newsletter, both the hardcopy and the online version, is around 50,000 The review website, newbooksasia, collects new titles in the field of Asian Studies and organises their review The reviews are published online and some are included in the Review section of the Newsletter The editorial assistant willThe International Institute for Asian Studies IIAS is a national and global research organisation and knowledge exchange platform, based in Leiden, The Netherlands The Institute initiates and promotes interdisciplinary and transsectoral programmes that engage partners in  and with  Asia, in the world The Institute seeks to promote a contextualised understanding of Asian realities and to pioneer new approaches to the studies of Asia and the Asian factor in a changing global environment It does so through an array of activities in the realms of research, education, publications, dissemination, network development, institutional support, and services to the community outside academia It seeks to contribute to a culturally and sociallyinformed policyrelevant knowledge oninwith AsiaFor more information about IIAS, please consult our website More details on the Newsletter can be found here, and for newbooksasia please visit the websiteWe offer a temporary position for twelve months, with the possibility of extension, dependent on work assessment and further developments Depending on experience, salary range from  2656, to  3548, gross per month scale 8 in accordance with the Collective Labour Agreement for Dutch UniversitiesLeiden University offers an attractive benefits package with additional holiday 8 and endofyear bonuses 83  Our individual choices model gives you some freedom to assemble your own set of terms and conditions For more information, see the websiteLeiden University is strongly committed to diversity within its community and especially welcomes applications from members of underrepresented groupsEnquiries can be sent to the Editor of the Newsletter, Sonja Zweegers, email sizweegersiiasnl, andor to the Reviews Editor, Wai Cheung, email wmcheungiiasnlPlease send your letter of motivation and CV to vacaturespenoservicesbbleidenunivnlMake sure to include the vacancy number in the subject line, and send it

predict consumer behavior Do you like working with large quantities of data Turning fast amounts of information into a simple to understand and easy to explain storyOur clients are some of the largest multinational companies who rely on our team of young scientist to decipher research data into meaningful insight You will be part of our science innovation team that are at the for front of innovation, advanced data modeling and big data analytics You will be part of a small, but global team of scientistsTo support our rapidly expanding Data Science team we are looking for an ambitious and enthusiastic computer scientist who takes initiative, can work independently, but also enjoys being part of a team of likeminded professionals The position is a blend of working on client projects and internal innovation projects For client projects you will be part of the fullcircle research project, which means from the project set up, transforming a clients question into a research question, using a variety of research methods, analyzing and presenting the data in a way client focusses way When working on our internal innovation projects, you will develop models, data infrastructures and creating, testing new blended approaches of a variety of research methods that would allow clients to gain an increasingly better insight in consumer behaviorQualificationsYou will play a critical role by combining technical skills and an entrepreneurial mindset We will ask the most of you in your interaction with clients, both internally and externallyWe offer a competitive salary  benefits package that includes the followingSKIM is an equal opportunity employer and offers a flexible working environmentAt SKIM we understand that our employees are our most valuable asset we are committed regulatory reporting towards the supervisors ECB, DNB, SRB In this role and within ABN AMROs data management governance the Regulatory Policy department members are appointed as delegated data users for Financial Accounting Reporting In this role the experts of the department are in the lead for setting groupwide reporting requirements, defining reporting data attributes CDE Critical Data Elements and validations rules This based on extensive knowledge of and experience in EU Directives and Regulations Knowledge of IFRS and accounting standards is certainly a benefit plus pointPolicies  Internal Control is set up within Financial Accounting as a staff unit at ABN AMRO Group level The department consists of 3 teams of experts 68 people per team in the field of Regulatory policies, IFRS policies and Internal Control Policies  Internal Control department is ABN AMROs center of expertise with regard to identifying, interpreting and assessing the impact of new regulations related to financial and regulatory reporting and translating this in reporting and process implementation requirements Within ABN AMROs data management governance the Policy  Internal Control department is appointed as delegated data user for Financial Accounting Reporting In this role the experts of the department are in the lead for defining reporting data attributes This based on extensive knowledge Job Title: Senior Underwriter Liability based in The Hague, The Netherlands
Job Description: Zurich Insurance has the perfect opportunity for an Underwriter Liability to strengthen our team You have a background and passion within this domain and you already have experience within the liability insurance market You combine analytical and critical thinking with a hands on attitude and commercial flair We have the job for youThis role is based in our offices in The Hague, The Netherlands Due to Covid19, all our staff is currently working from home Lets ensure and insure the future together, take care of each other and stay safe and healthyKey AccountabilitiesTogether with your colleagues you will build up and share your expertise in commercial General Liability Insurance Team work is key alongside the independent coordination of your own portfolio from A to Z Youre a transparent communicator and you want to broaden a national network with a passion for the Insurance business to help drive an organisation forwardYour responsibilities areRequirementsProfileYour actionPlease share with us your updated resume and motivation, applications are accepted until November 15th, please keep in mind that the vacancy will be online longerAn international, entrepreneurial and informal working environment with professional growth and development opportunities and salary and benefits in line with your experience and your future role and responsibilitiesWho we areZurich Commercial Insurance Benelux is part of the Zurich Group and is one of the most specialized insurance companies within nonlife insurance for local and international business in the Benelux market Looking for a challenging and inspiring work environment where you can make a difference At Zurich millions of individuals and businesses place their trust in our products and services every dayAre you ready to start a new adventure within a market leader of the insurance industryOur 53,000 employees worldwide form the basis of our success, enabling, businesses and communities to face a world of risk with confidence Imagine if you could help people do this all over the world Youd give them confidence and reassurance by protecting what they love most Its a big challenge, but you will be supported by a worldclass team who believe in helping you to reach your full potential and deliver on our promises

Job Title: Service Commissioning Engineer PLC - Operational Technology Expert
Job Description: Job TitleService Commissioning Engineer PLC  Operational Technology ExpertJob DescriptionAre you a technical service expertIndustrial Automation requires a new generation of PLC Control Engineers, this role is rapidly changing to a more demanding role to address the everchanging operational technology OT in the production environment together with our customers Within Vanderlande we follow this new trend and therefore we are looking for you to strengthen our teamGlobal Services is responsible for the development and implementation of LifeCycle Services to our systems worldwide With a growing share of around 20 of total sales, the service business has developed into a key part of the core business of Vanderlande The Controls Service Desk is part of the Global Service organization The primary task is to support 247 the Operational and Informational systems of customers within our three market segments Our Global Service Desk is a service organization that operates internationally, with the task of supporting customers and local service staff by analyzing problems and advising on controlsrelated mattersAs Service Commissioning Engineer PLC  Operational Technology Expert you are responsible for providing operational excellence support for a wide variety of customer specific software programs from the Operational Technology systems developed on equipment control level You handle Incidents, Problems, Changes and Services Requests that are dispatched by the 1st and 2nd level Service DesksYour main focus is analyzing, troubleshooting incidents and create solutions at the customer site You analyse the cause of the incident and come up with solutions to prevent reoccurrences and minimizes the impact of incidents that cannot be prevented problem management Youll then prepare, implement and test the agreed changes and implement a permanent solution change managementPerforming health checks independently, advising on modifications to systems, performing quality assurance and taking care of the seamless integration during Service and Product Take Overs are your daily activities as wellYou participate actively in the development and implementation of improvements technology, processes and tooling because you and your colleagues are the contact person for operational technology software related problems that cannot be resolved locally Therefore, you are an important link between the different internal service organisations, technology departments and the different business unitsAs an Service Commissioning Engineer PLC  Operational Technology Expert you have frequent customer contact, so its very important to have excellent communication skills You analyze problems, you listen to the customer needs and you can translate this into technical solutions Vanderlande is the global leader for valueadded logistic process automation at airports and in the parcel market, as well as a leading supplier of process automation solutions for warehouses In this world of technology, we believe in people  especially those who are totally dedicated, customerdriven and keen to continue learning throughout their career  This is embraced by our Vanderlande Academy and International Talent Development programmes, with over 800 courses conducted every year The focus is on freedom while being trusted to deliver, and this is one of the reasons why we received the highest rating of three stars in the Best Employer survey The Netherlands If youre ambitious and take your longterm career seriously, then please contact us to explore this global opportunity to join a company at the top of its game For more information or to apply for this challenging position, please visit careersvanderlandecom  If the challenging profile of Service Commissioning Engineer PLC  Operational Technology Expert appeals to you, apply now by filling in the application form and uploading you CV and cover letter For more information about this vacancy, please contact Mirre Sengers, Senior Recruiter 31 413 493 279

Job Title: Assistant/Associate professor in Political Communication or Political Journalism
Job Description: Are you driven when it comes to conducting research and practicing teaching Do you specialise in the field of Political Communication Effective immediately, we are seeking an assistant  associate professor for this specialisationWe are looking for an Assistant temporary or tenure track or Associate professor that fits the research program of the group focusing on Political Communication  Journalism in a digital societyYou haveFurther informationDo you have any questions or do you require additional information Please contactWould you like to learn more about working at the University of Amsterdam Visit our websiteOur offerThe position concerns a temporary employment of 38 hours per week for a term of 2 years If the candidate proves suitable, barring unforeseen organisational developments and assuming sufficient FTE availability, we intend to extend the term of employmentoffer the candidate a permanent employment contract For the UD positions, we are looking for fixed term candidates and candidates with the possibility of a permanent contract and salary depends on past education and relevant work experience, with a minimum salary of 3,746 and a maximum salary of 5,127 gross per month based on fulltime employment for a 38hour working week in keeping with scale 11, as per the Collective Labour Agreement of Dutch Universities For the UHD position salary depends on past education and relevant work experience, with a minimum salary of 5,190 and a maximum salary of 6,317 gross per month based on fulltime employment for a 38hour working week in keeping with scale 13, as per the Collective Labour Agreement of Dutch Universities We additionally offer an extensive package of secondary benefits, including 8 holiday allowance and a yearend bonus of 83A challenging work environment with a variety of duties and ample scope for individual initiative and development within an inspiring organisation The social and behavioural sciences play a leading role in addressing the major societal challenges faced by the world, the Netherlands and Amsterdam, now and in the futureTo work at the University of Amsterdam is to work in a discerning, independent, creative, innovative and international climate characterised by an open atmosphere and a genuine engagement with the city of Amsterdam and societyWithin the Faculty of Social and Behavioural Sciences the discipline of Communication Science offers a range of Bachelors and Masters degree programmes in the field of Communication Science The teaching and research in our Communication Science programmes is interdisciplinary and internationally oriented, offering tracks taught in both English and Dutch If you find this appealing, this may be the position for you The Amsterdam School of Communication Research ASCoR is the research institute for the Communication Science department The Department is the home of the Communication and Digital Society Initiative and it participates in several of the University and Faculty Research Priority AreasJob applicationDoes this profile sound like you If so, we are eager to receive your CV and covering letterYou may apply online by clicking on one of the following linksAssistant professor in Political Communication or Political JournalismAssociate professor in Political Communication or Political JournalismThe deadline for applications is 15 December 2020

offices Maintaining user accounts in Microsoft Active Directory Managing inventories of software licenses, software, hardware and other IT supplies Supporting with planning and executing internal IT working Experience in working with Windows and Mac Linux is a plus Understanding of networking WiFi, LAN and internet protocols Good problem solving skills and proactive mindset Ability to follow activities

LocationKuching, Borneo, MalaysiaDuration Minimum 2 weeksStart Dates Project is ongoing, and you can join at any time, depending upon availability Placements start each Monday from 225 Euros per weekFee Includes all food, accommodation, airport pickup, predeparture  incountry support, orientation and all project related activitiesDoes not Include flights, travel insurance, personal spending, visas and vaccinationsThis opportunity is designed to give you the contacts and experience to help further your career You are not replacing any member of staff, but helping alongside them, whilst learning new skillsMalaysia is a beautiful country filled with contrasts  culturally and geographically diverse, with dynamic cities and peaceful beaches, authentic small villages and pristine rainforests Essentially split between the mainland peninsula and the island of Borneo, Malaysia is incredibly ethnically and spiritually diverse with a combination of Malays, Chinese and Indians and indigenous groups practising many religions from Buddhism, Islam and Christianity to Hinduism and TaoismKuching is the capital city of Sarawak, one of two Malaysian states on Borneo and the gateway to its many natural wonders Its a charming and enticing city with old colonial architecture juxtaposed with modern towers It offers a lot to see and do and provides easy access to the nearby attractionsThis project works with several kindergartens schools in the Kuching area and allows you to encourage small children to learn and to grow by teaching them not only language and communication skills but also influencing them with new ideas which can help them flourish in the future You will get a chance to work in local kindergartens in a fun and informal atmosphere Focus will be more on playful interaction rather than formal teaching as the kids are aged 4 to 5 years old You will have an unforgettable and lifechanging experience and you will make a valuable contribution to the local communityDaily LifeMonday to Friday you will be teaching at the schools for 3 to 6 hours You should expect to leave your accommodation between 8 and 9 in the morning and leave the school around 3 or 4 in the afternoon A tasty lunch will be served at the schoolDuring school and public holidays you have the opportunity to take part in renovation work or special classes and English language camps organised by the local communityDuring teaching hours, you can wear casual clothes however you should still respect local customs and not wear anything revealingall information above is subject to change Please check the most up to date information on the Global Nomadic website when applying

ImagineThat you are working in a team which is responsible for the management and development of the mid and back office applications of the Corporate Bank The Corporate Banking Products Delivery Unit is one of the five delivery units within the IT Systems Wholesale International organisation Hence, the Products Delivery Unit provides services to the different operational departments within Wholesale and Rural WR worldwide The mission of the Products Delivery Unit is to continuously improve the capabilities of the corporate bank in order to become a truly client centric bank which is transparent, compliant and stands out in operational excellenceTo support this mission the Products Delivery Unit is currently executing the Core Banking Transformation CBT programme, one of the important strategic programmes within the Wholesale International organisation Within the CBT programme the Products Delivery Unit is responsible to seamlessly replace the existing Corporate Banking applications into one single platform And to create an Open Banking Layer connecting this to the outside world This all will contribute to the WR objectives to become a truly client centric bank by enhancing customer experience, reducing costs and operational risks, easing implementation of regulations, increasing efficiency and the ability to innovateMultiple DevOps teams are developing the Core Banking Platform and work together in building an accessible, safe and futureproof solution which facilitates standardised and STP processes worldwide with high accessibility for our customers at low costsOverall you be will a member of the Corporate Banking Products Delivery Unit with a focus on Trade and Commodity Finance Furthermore, you are an active member of the Core Banking Transformation Programme Trade DevOps team and will work closely with other disciplinesroles within Rabobank and third parties You have general interest in software development, testing and knowledge about the business domain Trade  Commodity FinanceAs a Business Analyst, you can make a differenceCollaboration is at the heart of everything we do Our Rabobank Wholesale and Rural WR team brings talented people together to deliver new functionality and changes in a very complex and fast changing landscape of core banking and reporting With you as a Junior Business Analyst the entire project team will consist of 200 diverse colleagues in a variety of rolesCustomer focus, initiative, communication and delivering results are clearly essential for the role of Junior Business Analyst In addition, its important that you recognize everything in the checklist belowWe are looking for a candidate who can work independently, with a handson attitudeYoull already be aware that Rabobank is a financial services provider for more than 85 million customers in 40 countries But did you know that we aim to contribute to real change with our Growing a better world together mission We do so in countless ways, such asDo you want to become the ideal version of yourself We would love to help you achieve this by focusing firmly on your growth, development, and investing in an environment where you keep learning every day We give you the space to innovate and initiate In this way, we offer you numerous opportunities to grow and help you exceed your expectations, to do the right thing exceptionally well, and to therefore grow as a professional In addition, with us on the basis of a 36hour working week, you can also expectAre you the person were looking for Are you ready to join Rabobank as a Business Analyst and to make a difference to yourself, our customers and to society We look forward to receiving your application for this vacancy in UtrechtGood to knowEveryone is different, and it is exactly those differences that help us become an even better bank Thats why we want to know who you really are

Ben jij organisatorisch en administratief sterk En krijg je energie van een dynamische werkomgeving Dan is de tijdelijke functie administratief medewerker binnen het Client Acceptance and Review team iets voor jouWAAR KOM JE TE WERKENJe komt te werken in een projectteam dat het Client Acceptance and Review Committee CARC ondersteunt Het CARC bespreekt klantrelaties met de hoogste risicoclassificatie met betrekking tot financile criminaliteit en buigt zich over de klant, nadat CDDKYC analisten en de afdeling compliance advies hebben uitgebracht Het CARC kan besluiten om 1 de klantrelatie onder bepaalde voorwaarden te accepteren of voort te zetten of 2 de klantrelatie te weigeren of te beIndigenWAT GA JE DOENJe bent verantwoordelijk voor de tijdige en accurate voorbereiding en administratieve afhandeling van de aangeleverde  gefiatteerde en te fiatteren hoog risico relatiecomplexdossiers Op basis van de notulen en actielijst informeer jij de analistenrelatiemanagers over de besluitvorming in het CARC Je zorgt ervoor dat de vergaderingen vastgelegd worden in de agendas van de deelnemers van de CARC vergaderingen De afdeling Continuous Improvement waar het CARCsecretariaat onderdeel van uit maken, bestaat verder uit Competence Officers, Outsourcings Support Unit, Functional Leads Quality Checkers en Incidentissue management De totale afdeling bestaat nu uit bijna 30 personen, waarvan op dit moment vier CARCsecretarissen en twee CARCondersteunersWIE BEN JIJWAT BIEDEN WIJ JOUJe standplaats is Van Asch van Wijckstraat 55 te Amersfoort Ook is er een sublocatie in Rotterdam, Coolsingel 93 Uiteraard staan we open voor het Nieuwe Werken waardoor je, binnen afspraken, kunt werken op andere locaties en momenten Je maakt onderdeel uit van de Staffunit Continuous Improvement van het DFC KYC Centre CB Samen met je collegas creer je de sfeer Je rapporteert aan de Staff Manager Continuous Improvement van het KYC Centre CB Je werkt in een dynamische en veranderlijke omgeving waar gewerkt wordt met doelstellingen gericht op aantal en kwaliteitWord jij enthousiast van deze functie Solliciteer dan via onderstaande knop en laat in een bondige motivatie weten waarom jij hier pastUiteraard staat deze vacature open voor iedereen die zich hierin herkentOpleidingHBO  bachelor

Job Title: Stagiair(e) Safety, Quality Assurance & Security bij Transavia
Job Description: Bij Transavia zoeken wij een Stagiaire op de afdeling Safety, Quality Assurance  Security Ben jij op zoek naar een uitdagende en leerzame meewerkstage in een zeer beweeglijke omgeving Gaat jouw hart sneller kloppen van de luchtvaart Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jouWat ga je doenJe volgt een leuke studie en je wilt je alvast orinteren bij een bedrijf wat jou aanspreekt Je wilt niet zomaar een stage, maar zoekt een aantrekkelijk bedrijf waar je echt wat toevoegt, je verantwoordelijkheden hebt en samenwerkt met vriendelijke collegas Transavia biedt jou die mogelijkheidTijdens deze stage maak je deel uit van een enthousiast team van ongeveer 15 medewerkers Het team bestaat onder andere uit Safety en Quality Engineers en Safety Officers Jouw stagebegeleider is n van de Safety Engineers en heeft voldoende kennis in huis om jou een interessante stage en goede begeleiding te kunnen biedenConcreterAls meewerk stagiair op de afdeling Safety, Quality Assurance  Security ondersteun je op dagelijkse basis de Safety Engineers en verwerk je onder andere Safety Reports afkomstig van flight crew, cabin crew, maintenance staff en ground handlers Daarnaast zal er een individuele opdracht geformuleerd worden Natuurlijk kan het zo zijn dat je tijdens de stageperiode een bijdrage levert aan andere taken of bij projecten betrokken wordtWie ben jijWat kun je van ons verwachten

Job Title: Programme Intern on UN Human Rights Council, UPR, and Business, Workplace and LGBTI Equality
Job Description: This is an exciting opportunity to join ILGA World, the global LGBTI membershipbased organisation with more than 1,600 member organisations in over 160 countries Anyone with dedication to  and experience in regard to  human rights of and social justice for persons of diverse sexual orientations, gender identities, gender expressions and sex characteristics who meets the requirements set out in the application form is welcome to applyThe internship is a great opportunity for somebody who has an interest in human rights and LGBTI issues, and wants to gain experience in working for an international human rights organisation that represents LGBTI organisations, communities and movements on a global stage It is aimed at LGBTI human rights activists who are at an early stage of their careerThe internship is sixmonths long and will start in February 2021 The internship is virtual, and the intern can be based anywhere with good internet connection The exact working hours and dates can be flexible, but a candidate should be available to work fulltime 375 hoursweek The intern receives a financial compensationThe successful candidate will be expected to perform the following tasks

The internship is due to start as soon as possibleTransition International TI is a Netherlandsbased, international consultancy firm with a network of senior consultants around the world We specialise in tackling the challenges of transitions We promote change through the provision of high level, tailor made training and advisory services TI, while operating on a commercial basis, is a valuedriven consultancy firm We are guided by the ambition to contribute to a peaceful and more secure world, in which human dignity and our environment are both respected and protected We demonstrate this commitment and promote these values in everything that we undertake For more information, please visit our website We have an interesting opening for an active and vibrant individual, who wants to work in a high paced environment The internship will be 6 months The intern will have the opportunity to develop their skills, gain practical work experience, and familiarise themselves with the multidimensionality of the development and peacebuilding field In addition, this internship provides you with a worldwide network of colleagues and clients While all will depend on our assignments, tasks may includeTI offers an informal, innovative and dynamic learning environment Free housing is provided at our staff flat in Heerlen NL and lunch is provided at the office No payments will be made under this contract There is likelihood, in case of outstanding performance, to obtain a junior professional post after completion of this internshipApplicants must have a laptop which they can work from with Microsoft Office installedPlease be aware that nonEU citizens need a visa to stay more than 90 days in the Netherlands Transition International is not in a position to help the intern obtain a visa As such, any nonEU candidate applying for this position should have a valid visa for 6 monthsSelection will take place on a rolling basis

Job Title: Personal Assistant | Utrecht | Secretary Plus Utrecht
Job Description: Vacature van Secretary Plus Utrecht, locatie UtrechtWord jij gelukkig van een afwisselende functie binnen een dynamische organisatie, waarin je meerdere ballen weet hoog te houden Dan is dit wellicht de baan die bij jou pastAls Personal Assistant ben jij de rechterhand van de directeur en het eerste aanspreekpunt voor collegas en externe relaties Jij als Personal Assistant bent de verbinder van de afdeling en daardoor ben jij overal van op de hoogte Met jouw proactieve en positieve houding zorg jij ervoor dat jij iedereen een stapje voor bent en dat alle zaken efficint geregeld worden Wij verwachten dat jij meedenkt in diverse processen en jezelf ook durft te laten zien en horen als jij andere ideen hebtIn jouw als Personal Assistant rol sta jij stevig in je schoenen, stel jij de juiste prioriteiten en weet jij snel te schakelen in hectische situatiesHet gaat om een uitdagende functie voor 3240 uur, waarbij je terecht komt in een klein en hardwerkend teamAls Personal Assistant ben jij verantwoordelijk voor de volgende werkzaamhedenJij bent een echte aanpakker die goed onder druk kan werken en tegelijkertijd weet jij overzicht en rust te creren In jouw rol als Personal Assistant verwachten wij dat jij goed om kunt gaan met vertrouwelijke informatie, dat jij de Nederlandse taal uitstekend beheerst en dat jij een zeer goede kennis hebt van programmas zoals Word, PowerPoint eis en Excel Als persoon ben jij erg flexibel, toegankelijk en heb jij een groot verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel Jij gaat geen uitdaging uit de weg, bent ondernemend en gaat accuraat te werk5cd8a0b9cc68f9ffa4c9253553278a55

Job Title: Transportplanner ploegendienst fulltime Pernis | Pernis Rotterdam | Work-Staff Personeelsdiensten
Job Description: Vacature van WorkStaff Personeelsdiensten, locatie Pernis RotterdamBinnen de functie van transportplanner hou je je bezig met het verzorgen van containertrucking voor n vaste opdrachtgever Tevens het indelen en verdelen van wagens, complete ladingen, stukgoedzendingen en retourvrachten Het begeleiden van chauffeurs tijdens de uitvoering van transporten Een afgeronde MBOHBO opleiding in de logistieke branche enof ervaring in de logistiek branche Je bent spontaan, leergierig, enthousiast en je weet van aanpakken Je bent stressbestendig en kan snel schakelen Je bent nauwkeurig, en beschikt over cijfermatig inzicht Je kan je vinden in de term Niet lullen, maar poetsen Je bent flexibel met overwerk mocht dit voorkomen Je staat je mannetje Je bent in het bezit van eigen vervoer, dit is nodig vanwege de bereikbaarheid van het bedrijfHet bedrijf valt in n woord toe te lichten en dat is Rotterdams Het bedrijf heeft een nononsens mentaliteit en zoekt dan ook medewerkers die niet vies zijn van hard werken Verder gaat dit wel gepaard met veel lol en onwijs leuke collegas Je moet wel in zijn voor een grapje en een gezellig gesprek op de werkvloer De sfeer binnen het bedrijf is dan ook erg informeel Je zal komen te werken binnen een dynamisch team die met veel plezier het werk uitvoert Mochten zij tevreden zijn dan nemen zij jou al na 3 maanden over op contract Verder bieden zij vele doorgroeimogelijkheden en verwachtte zij in de aankomende jaren nogmaals een grote groei mee te makenKlinkt dit als d baan voor jou Dan zie ik graag jouw CV tegemoetVoor vragen over deze vacature kan je terecht bij Deborah Riegman Deborah is onze recruiter en is te bereiken via dvia de button Solliciteer nu op deze pagina of op 08548943615cd8a0b9cc68f9ffa4c9253553278a55
